MATRIX_URI.description: The URI of the matrix server

MATRIX_SERVERNAME.description: The name of the matrix server

MATRIX_SYNC_USER_NAME.description: Name of admin user to manage the server.

MATRIX_SYNC_USER_PASSWORD.description: Shared secret for the Matrix server to generate access tokens. (optional - if MATRIX_SYNC_USER_TOKEN or MATRIX_SECRET are set)

MATRIX_SYNC_USER_TOKEN.description: AccessToken of synchronization user which. (optional - if MATRIX_SYNC_USER_PASSWORD or MATRIX_SECRET are set)

MATRIX_SECRET.description: Shared secret for the Matrix server to generate access tokens. (optional - if MATRIX_SYNC_USER_PASSWORD or MATRIX_SYNC_USER_TOKEN are set)

MATRIX_SYNC_USER_DISPLAYNAME.description: Define a custom displayname to be set for the sync user

MATRIX_SYNC_USER_AVATAR_PATH.description: Upload a custom avatar for the sync user

RABBITMQ_URI.description: The URI of the RabbitMQ / AMQP server

RABBIT_MQ_QUEUE.description: The name of the RabbitMQ channel we listen to
